column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I'm a huge fan of ramen
column2: so I'm glad I tried JINYA. I ordered the vegetarian ramen. It was decent
column3: but nothing special. I was expecting the broth to have a lot of flavor
column4: but this stock just tasted like boiled vegetables and soy sauce- not so tasty. It contained about 4 pieces of cauliflower
column7: and was garnished with spring mix on the top. All in all
column8: if you want good vegetarian ramen
column9: try a place like Tiger Den or Ramen Tatsuya. The service was great- staff was very friendly. Music wasn't too loud
